title: The Iron Druid Chronicles - Kevin Hearne - Books 1-8 plus extras
description:
The Iron Druid Chronicles - Kevin Hearne - Books 1-8 plus extras
Updated Collection!

Included in this torrent: books 1 through 8, plus Grimoire of the Lamb (0.5), Two Ravens One Crow (4.5)
and Three Slices (7.5). Also included are books 1-7 in epub format.

All files have been re-encoded to MP3, 32kbs and split into 30 minute files. A few were already split and 
may be at a higher bit rate.

Book 8 was finally uploaded. Thanks Cybotage! There is a previous version of this collection with only books 1 to 7.
If you are seeding that, please drop it and seed this instead.

Kevin Hearne has plans for a final book 9 as well.

PLEASE SEED THIS COLLECTION

The Iron Druid Chronicles is a series of urban fantasy novels, written by Kevin Hearne and published by Del Rey Books. All the books including short stories have recorded Audiobooks narrated by Luke Daniels (for the US) and Christopher Ragland (for the UK market).
